thread.section_title: Trustpilot Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Trustpilot | www.trustpilot.com
thread.title: Daniel

author: Daniel
title: Daniel
text:
Left a review a few weeks ago and Trustpilot removed it stating I left the review with the wrong company which is completely not true, I have requested my review be put back up is it was me personal view of my experience and my e-mails have not be responded to
My company has now also experienced them removing good reviews even with evidence of customer booking details sent to them so again they're picking and choosing what they want to keep depending on what you pay them
All I want is a fair trade and not this kind of treatment I don't think that's too much to ask for
I have many people to turn to in my industry as we're the largest Luxury Transport Company in the UK,
